about_the_game:
Life of Delta - Support Adventures! Pack


The support adventures! pack contains a selection of goodies for Life of Delta, for all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developer of the game.

Included:

  • The complete Life of Delta soundtrack
  • Digital Art Book - a look at Life of Delta's art style and world
  • A walkthrough brochure for the game
